tag_list: matthew-rothenberg, theladders, ziff-davis, san-diego, ucsd, hachette-filipacchi, zdnet, cnet
overview: Matthew Rothenberg is editor-in-chief of TheLadders. He’s covered people’s careers, lives and passions for more than two decades. He started his career in technology journalism at MacWEEK and was editor-in-chief of eWEEK magazine along with stints at ZDNet, CNET and Hachette Filipacchi. Matthew won a Jesse H. Neal Award for business journalism. He lives in New Jersey with his wife and children.
